languages.text: Адептус Арбитес — организация, стоящая на страже Лекс Империалис, священного свода законов Империума.

traits.locale_text: Адептус Арбитес — полицейская организация, стоящая на страже Лекс Империалис, священного свода законов Империума.

languages.text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: Адептус Арбитес — организация, стоящая на страже Лекс Империалис, священного свода законов Империума.

traits.locale_text: The Adeptus Arbites are an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: Die Adeptus Arbites sind eine Organisation, die die heiligen Gesetze des Imperiums, bekannt als Lex Imperia, verteidigt und durchsetzt.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Die Adeptus Arbites sind eine Organisation, die die heiligen Gesetze des Imperiums, bekannt als Lex Imperia, verteidigt und durchsetzt.

languages.text: L'Adeptus Arbites est une organisation qui défend et fait appliquer la loi sacrée de l'Imperium que l'on nomme la Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: L'Adeptus Arbites est une organisation qui défend et fait appliquer la loi sacrée de l'Imperium que l'on nomme la Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: 帝国法务部严格遵守《帝国法典》的条款，负责维护、捍卫帝国的神圣律法。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: 帝国法务部严格遵守《帝国法典》的条款，负责维护、捍卫帝国的神圣律法。

languages.text: El Adeptus Arbites es una organización que defiende y mantiene el código sagrado de la ley del Imperium, conocida como Lex Imperialis.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: El Adeptus Arbites es una organización que defiende y mantiene el código sagrado de la ley del Imperium, conocida como Lex Imperialis.

languages.text: 高等裁定局は、レックス・インペリアとして知られる、帝国の聖なる法の規範を守り支える組織である。
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局は、レックス・インペリアとして知られる、帝国の聖なる法の規範を守り支える組織である。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites, İmparatorluk'un Lex İmperialis adıyla bilinen kutsal yasalarını koruyup uygulatan bir teşkilattır.
languages.original_text: The Adeptus Arbites is an organisation that defends and upholds the Imperium's sacred code of law, known as the Lex Imperialis.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites, İmparatorluk'un Lex İmperialis adıyla bilinen kutsal yasalarını koruyup uygulatan bir teşkilattır.
